title: Anyone else having dc problems?
body: So the last two games I've had problems where i would randomly dc, the strange thing is that its not just me usually more the one person its pretty frustrating after the first attempting to disconnect i keep not being able to connect to the server strange this would happen two games in a row (internet working fine) and more than one person too. Anyone else getting this??

replies.body: Yep, happening server wide. I cant even fucking START a game now. Bloody unreal. I bet you Riot wont re-enstate the ip you lose for it either.

that sucks, i guess i shouldn't have queued for that second ranked game but i thought the problem would be gone not get infinitely worse cant even get onto this game. better not get match restricted ill be pissed.
